name: Chrome Clicker 2.0
description:
Made by APBG_Oficial!

This is a "Clicker" game made in Scratch ported to .exe (executable).

It doesn't have SAVE/LOAD till now.

It's 100% free and only for PC (till now).

APBG made this in 2020 in scratch, but now (2022) it's on ITCH.IO!

Updates: v2.0 = Better Chrome logo image and  icon bug fix.
